Vitamin.name: Vitamin A
Vitamin.description: Supports vision, immune function, and skin health.

Vitamin.name: Vitamin C
Vitamin.description: An antioxidant that supports the immune system and collagen production.

Vitamin.name: Vitamin D
Vitamin.description: Regulates calcium and phosphate levels in the body, supporting bone health and immunity.

Vitamin.name: Vitamin E
Vitamin.description: An antioxidant that protects cells from damage and supports immune function.

Vitamin.name: Vitamin K
Vitamin.description: Important for blood clotting and bone metabolism.

Vitamin.name: Vitamin B12
Vitamin.description: Essential for red blood cell formation, neurological function, and DNA synthesis.
